instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00840: What is 820-00840? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> UBS-c short
threads.message: PI3USB32224BXEAE short. It does not have this component in the electrical scheme.[ATTACH type="full"]59386[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> UBS-c short
threads.message:
You can buy it in Aliexpress.

[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.aliexpress.com/item/4000852713893.html?spm=a2g0o.productlist.0.0.27352611PszYgz&algo_pvid=d48bca92-737f-4eaa-8d45-cd361f715756&algo_expid=d48bca92-737f-4eaa-8d45-cd361f715756-0&btsid=0b0a0ad815984594527675586ed26e&ws_ab_test=searchweb0_0,searchweb201602_,searchweb201603_[/URL]

Board can work without it, but weird problems can appear with USB ports; is better to solder it.
